welcome.title: Die Versandsoftware für den E-Commerce
welcome.mainText: Bereits mehr als 10.000 Onlinehändler vertrauen auf Sendcloud. Join the revolution!
welcome.buttonLabel: Einloggen oder kostenlosen Sendcloud Account erstellen

notification.title: Die Service Point Zustellung ist deaktiviert!
notification.message: Bitte aktivieren Sie die Service Points in Sendcloud unter "Einstellungen" > "Integrationen" > {channel}, um die Versandmethode verwenden zu können.

defaultValues.title: Default values
defaultValues.paragraph: To send international shipment data to Sendcloud, please select a default value that will be used. If you have mapped value for HS code and origin country in the next section, and the value is not found on the product, the defined value below will be used.

dataMapping.title: Data mapping
dataMapping.paragraph: Please map product HS-code and origin country to Shopware custom product attributes. Mapped attribute values will be used when plugin sends order data to Sendcloud.

customsInfo.hsCodeHelpText: The HS code is the harmonized system code. If you want to ship
customsInfo.originCountryHelpText: In most cases, the country where the product is manufactured.
customsInfo.hsCodePlaceholderText: Enter default value for HS code field
